snippet: Pakistanis from across the political and religious spectrum united in revulsion over the attack on Malala Yousafzai, a 14-year-old Pakistani schoolgirl and education rights campaigner.
abstract: Pakistanis from across political and religious spectrum unite in revulsion over shooting attack on 14-year-old Malala Yousafzai, schoolgirl and education rights campaigner, by Taliban; Yousafzai is unconscious and remains on a ventilator.

byline.contributor: Ismail Khan contributed reporting from Peshawar, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: Pakistanis from across the political and religious spectrum united in revulsion over the attack on Malala Yousafzai, a 14-year-old Pakistani schoolgirl and education rights campaigner.

headline.seo: Pakistan Angry Over Taliban Shooting of Schoolgirl
headline.main: Pakistanis Unite in Outrage Over Girl’s Shooting by Taliban
headline.print_headline: Pakistanis Unite in Outrage Over Girl’s Shooting by Taliban
